channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Trade Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Trade Management

item.title: CVE-2024-21073|2024-04-16T21:26:23.149Z -- Oracle Corporation -- Trade Management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Trade Management product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Claim LOV). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.13. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Trade Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Trade Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
